meanings.sent1: She splurges on designer clothes every month.
meanings.sent2: He always splurges on expensive dinners when he gets his paycheck.
meanings.sent3: Even though she knows she should save, she still splurges on fancy vacations.
meanings.sent4: His love for gadgets makes him splurge on the latest technology without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The bride-to-be decided to splurge on a luxurious wedding dress.

meanings.definition: An act of spending money freely or extravagantly.
meanings.sent1: Her shopping spree was a series of splurges on unnecessary items.
meanings.sent2: The company's financial report showed multiple splurges on unnecessary office decorations.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unexpected splurges on expensive cat toys always amused the owner.
meanings.sent4: The town's sudden splurge on new infrastructure surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The billionaire's yacht was the ultimate splurge in his collection of luxury items.
